articles.title: The growing movement against Hollywood's hypersexualization of Asian women - CBC.ca
articles.description: Following an increase in anti-Asian violence, Asian actors and scholars have begun a campaign to change how they are portrayed in movies and TV.
articles.content:
Margaret Cho doesn't go outside anymore.
While that sentence may seem unsurprising for life during a pandemic, Cho's decision and her fear don't stem from the virus. Or, at least, not directly.

articles.title: Asian esports players describe 'unspeakable and terrifying' racism and harassment - IOL
articles.description: In a viral video with over 300 000 views since it was posted to Twitter on Tuesday, professional esports player Lee ’Fearless’ Eui-seok denounced hateful, anti-Asian acts he has experienced since coming to the United States.
articles.content:

By Shannon Liao 
"They call us Chinese, then harass us. The racism here is unspeakable."

articles.title: Dallas Fuel Overwatch League Player Says Being Asian In The US Right Now Is ‘Terrifying’ - Kotaku Australia
articles.description: Professional Overwatch League player Lee ‘Fearless’ Eui-seok of Dallas Fuel has spoken out about racism since moving to Texas.
